snippet: A state judge in Pennsylvania prohibited enforcement of the law. He wrote that telling people they would not be able to vote with ID in the future was “erroneous at best, deceptive at worst.”
abstract: Pennsylvania State Judge Bernard L McGinley prohibits enforcement of strongly contested law requiring voters to show state-approved identification.
lead_paragraph: A state judge in Pennsylvania prohibited enforcement of the law. He wrote that telling people they would not be able to vote with ID in the future was “erroneous at best, deceptive at worst.”

headline.main: Judge Blocks State Voter ID Law
headline.print_headline: Judge Blocks State Voter ID Law
